import React from 'react' import { Post } from '../../../types/blog.type' interface Props { item: Post onDeletePost: (id: string) => void isEdit: boolean setIsEdit: React.Dispatch> } // destructuring const PostItem = ({ item, onDeletePost, isEdit, setIsEdit }: Props) => { return (
{item.publishDate}

{item.title}

{item.description}

) } export default PostItem
